titles.title: An original resolution recognizing the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Laborers' International Union of North America, and congratulating members and officers of the Laborers' International Union of North America for the union's many achievements.

An original resolution recognizing the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Laborers' International Union of North America, and congratulating members and officers of the Laborers' International Union of North America for the union's many achievements.

action.text: Committee on the Judiciary ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on the Judiciary. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Kennedy with a preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 68.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate with an amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: Recognizes the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Laborers' International Union of North America and acknowledges LIANA's contributions to the structural development and building of the United States and to the well-being of workers.
